existing_features.title: Display specific file types (JSON, Folder, etc.) in the Type column. For files with unknown or unrecognized file types, display 'N/A' instead of showing the entire filename.
Reposition the 'Upload Files' button to appear before the 'New Folder' button in the toolbar. Style it similar to the folder buttons with a subtle yellow border while keeping the blue color scheme.
Restore the blue colors in the Drive path breadcrumb navigation (Drive > testup > test2 > test3) as shown in v0.4.121.
Update the application version to v0.4.127 in frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts.
